concept.title: Advanced Usage: Hinge Examples
concept.shortdesc: The hinge field determines how the value is distributed when the report is broken down. The most common use of hinge is if the rate is fixed, and you want to determine which event should determine the distribution of the value. Hinge can also be used with the rate in various ways.

p.note: This feature is for advanced users to approximate values. The resulting information should not be treated as exact values.
